alert.note: Alert for East Washington North Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 10 at 2:08PM PDT until August 11 at 12:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PDT THURSDAY FOR FOR ABUNDANT LIGHTNING AND DRY FUELS FOR NORTH CASCADES IN EASTERN WASHINGTON... * Affected Area: Fire Weather Zone 698 East Washington North Cascades (Zone 698). * Thunderstorms: Scattered thunderstorms are expected to develop late this afternoon into the evening. Another round of thunderstorms is possible overnight into Thursday morning. * Outflow Winds: Gusty and erratic winds expected with thunderstorms. * Impacts: Thunderstorms combined with dry fuels will likely result in new fire starts.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly.
